comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage Orphaned Photographs , and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Really a nice Photo.  The baby is so cute.   Photo tells, life was not so easy back then.  No sidewalks,   They had to endure with what they had.
